items.title: ‘We never want to think our children would strip us of all our money’: Is it safe to give my kids my Social Security number?
items.description: “Regrettably, I have a good friend whose brother robbed their mother of a significant amount of money before her death.”

items.title: Former Celtics star Jrue Holiday sells his Boston mansion for $6.69 million
items.description: Months after he was traded to the Portland Trail Blazers, Holiday has finalized the sale of his Boston home.

items.title: ‘Today’ host Jason Kennedy sells his renovated Agoura Hills home for $3.9 million in 45 days
items.description: Jason Kennedy, of NBC’s “Today” show, has found a buyer for his sprawling property in the Santa Monica Mountains in Los Angeles County.

items.title: The Big Short’s Michael Burry takes on the Big Tech bulls, but holds fire on this cult favorite.
items.description: Burry is betting against Nvidia and Palantir shares

items.title: Why 2026 could be a banner year for regional-bank stocks
items.description: A steepening yield curve, a looser regulatory environment and increasing M&A activity all bode well, according to Catherine Mealor of KBW.
